short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a bunch of useful features to schoology on supported domains, check github for feature list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
Enables reloading Materials list in all courses
Replaces the Faux fullscreen mode used by playposits
Discussion boards now reorder when someone is highlighted
Adds email section to left sidebar on the materials page
Discussion Boards now have a save button

To request a feature, please create a pull request or issue on the GitHub page or email me at SchoologyHotReload@protonmail.com with a properly formatted request and all relative information, not just "add this feature plz"

Supported domains:
schoology.org (untested)
lms.beth.k12.pa.us (tested)

for more domain support create an issue or pull request on the github repository
